common_issues.login_problems: If you're having trouble logging in, try resetting your password using the 'Forgot Password' link on the login page.
common_issues.payment_issues: For payment-related issues, please ensure your card details are correct and that your bank has authorized the transaction.
common_issues.website_not_loading: If our website isn't loading, please check your internet connection and try clearing your browser cache.

product_info.product_a: Product A is our flagship solution designed for enterprise customers with advanced features.
product_info.product_b: Product B is our mid-tier solution perfect for small to medium businesses.
product_info.product_c: Product C is our entry-level solution for individuals and startups.

company_info.support_hours: Our support team is available Monday to Friday, 9 AM to 6 PM EST.
company_info.contact_number: For urgent matters, you can reach us at 1-800-123-4567.
company_info.email: For non-urgent inquiries, please email info@company.com.
